channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-6927] Add support for MSSQL in schematool
item.description: Schematool is the preferred way of initializing schema for Hive. Since HIVE-6862 provided the script for MSSQL it would be nice to add the support for it in schematool.
item.summary: Add support for MSSQL in schematool

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
